channel.title: nativeaot on minidump.net
channel.description: Recent content in nativeaot on minidump.net

item.title: Writing a .NET profiler in C# — Part 4
item.description: Part 4 of the series about using NativeAOT to write a .NET profiler in C#, learning many things about native interop in the process. In this part, we learn how to call methods from ICorProfilerInfo.

item.title: Writing a .NET profiler in C# — Part 3
item.description: Part 3 of the series about using NativeAOT to write a .NET profiler in C#, learning many things about native interop in the process. In this part, we write a source generator to automatically generate the boilerplate code needed to implement the ICorProfilerCallback interface.

item.title: Writing a .NET profiler in C# — Part 2
item.description: Part 2 of the series about using NativeAOT to write a .NET profiler in C#, learning many things about native interop in the process. In this part, we improve the code from the previous article by using instance methods instead of static methods.

item.title: Writing a .NET profiler in C# - Part 1
item.description: Part 1 of the series about using NativeAOT to write a .NET profiler in C#, learning many things about native interop in the process. In this part, we will see how to mimic a COM interface in C#.

item.title: Writing native WinDbg extensions in C#
item.description: Using NativeAOT and ClrMD to write a native WinDbg extension in .NET.
